definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: The particle size distributions of submicrometer particles during pulverized coal combustion were typically bimodal.
sentences.chinese: 煤粉燃燒細粒子的粒徑分佈呈典型的雙峯分佈。

sentences.english: But Roxithromycin sustained release pellets with smaller size show a better bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 但小粒徑羅紅黴素緩釋微丸具有更高的生物利用度。

sentences.english: With increase of the particle size the photodegradation efficiency decrease obviously.
sentences.chinese: 而隨着顆粒粒徑的增加，光降解效率明顯降低。

sentences.english: Compared to high-TDS condition, the grain of sand soil was a more primary controlling factor of capillary rise.
sentences.chinese: 相比高礦化度，粒徑是控制毛細水上升的主要因素。

sentences.english: The size distribution of pellet is narrow and high round.
sentences.chinese: 成丸粒徑均勻，真球度高。

sentences.english: Sea salt source contribution to the coast aerosol increased with the diameter of particulate.
sentences.chinese: 海鹽源對氣溶膠的貢獻隨氣溶膠粒徑增大而增加。

sentences.english: Pellet diameter and its distribution are the most important index of pellet quality.
sentences.chinese: 球團粒徑及其分佈是衡量球團礦質量的重要指標。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effects of powders with different diameters of schizonepeta on anti-pyretic and analgesic effects.
sentences.chinese: 目的荊芥不同粒徑粉體的解熱鎮痛作用的比較研究。

sentences.english: The nominal diameter has little significance in sediment transportation.
sentences.chinese: 等容粒徑在沉沙輸移中意義不大。

sentences.english: Grain _ size in winter is bigger than it in summer.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的中值粒徑比夏季的粗。

sentences.english: Considering the influences of the Particle volume fraction and the distribution of particle size on the flow.
sentences.chinese: 考慮粉粒體積分率及粒徑分佈對流動的影響。

sentences.english: The smaller the diameter of filtration medium was, the smaller the penetration of aerosol.
sentences.chinese: 過濾介質粒徑越小，穿透率越低。

sentences.english: In summary, there will be a good prospect for the application of HDC in the determination of particle size distribution features of particulate drug delivery systems.
sentences.chinese: 在微粒製劑粒徑分佈特徵檢測上具有良好的應用前景。

sentences.english: The extraction of indigo naturalis powder with different diameters was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究提取不同粒徑青黛的溶出情況。

sentences.english: Effects of different particle sizes of bamboo flour on mechanical properties of the composites were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同粒徑竹粉對複合材料力學性能的影響。

sentences.english: The results showed that Al-humic floc size followed a lognormal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，腐植酸絮體的粒徑呈現對數正態分佈。
